text:
(1)
Macy's Thanksgiving Parade, 1932, No. 4. Another view of the alligator balloon, on Columbus Circle; the view is north on Broadway.
November 24, 1932.

P. L. Sperr.

(2)
No. 5. An ostrich, at Columbus Circle, Central Park in the background.
November 24, 1932.

P. L. Sperr.

(3)
No. 6. A cannon, which shoots toy balloons.
November 24, 1932.

P. L. Sperr.
title: Celebrations - Parades - Municipal events - Macy's Thanksgiving Parade.

text:
(1)
Macy's Thanksgiving Parade, 1932, No. 13, at Columbus Circle. A spotted jaguar is seen in the air over Columbus Circle; the view is north on Broadway. November 24, 1932.

P. L. Sperr.

(2)
No. 14. The spotted jaguar, with Central Park West and Central Park in the background. November 24, 1932.

P. L. Sperr.
title: Celebrations - Parades - Municipal events - Macy's Thanksgiving Parade.
